content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There might be situations where the user wants to get (complains of not getting) the notifications sent to a Global DG (Location DG, Org Everyone, Org Employees, Org Contractors, For instance, a user is in New York, but wants to get the notifications for Los Angeles; a user moved to another office / city / country, but still doesn't get his notifications etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Or vice versa, user wants to stop getting the notifications sent to a Global DG.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It’s not possible to remove ort add person to a certain Location DG, but it’s possible to provide access to read emails sent to this location.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More information about such types of requests available here: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/uqMbMw\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Managing permissions to receive emails sent to a Global DG\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
